short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can get Pull Requests on GitHub on a regular basis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can get Pull Requests on GitHub on a regular basis.

Usage.
1. Open the options page
2. Set your GitHub username
3. Get a personal accelerator token from GitHub and set it up
4. Click the Save button
5. Click the Fetch Repositories button to get the repositories
6. Check the repository for which you want to get a Pull Request
